featured_institute.name: Indian Institute of Mass Communication (IIMC)
featured_institute.title: Crown Jewel of Journalism
reasons_for_being_best: IIMC's curriculum is continually updated to reflect modern media trends. Recently granted deemed-to-be university status, it has launched cutting-edge programmes in emerging areas—for example, master's courses in Media Business Studies and Strategic Communication, and training modules on Generative AI, Drone Journalism, AR/VR, and Health Communication.

The institute has well-known professionals training students and simulation of real newsroom working conditions. And the unique environment of mentorship, working under veteran journalists and communication professionals further help IIMC deliver job-ready skills.
The campus has undergone massive upgradation of infrastructure—multi-lingual labs, smart classrooms, professional TV and radio studios, latest tools for AI-based content creation.

There is close connection between students and the media industry, which benefits from guest lectures by prominent editors to obligatory internships helping connect classroom to the newsroom. It also has a dedicated placement cell.
IIMC has one of the largest alumni networks in journalism, yielding powerful media professionals for nearly six decades. It adds a lot to the prestige and industry connections.

metadata.note: Course fee includes Tuition fee + Other fees for entire duration. RoI (return on investment) is calculated based on average annual salary/total course fees (entire duration).
